item.description:
Enjoy some of Doo Wop’s favorites. Belmonts: “A Teenager in Love,” “Where or When,” “Tell Me Why” Duprees: "My Own True Love," "You Belong to Me," "Have You Heard," "Why Don’t You Believe in Me," "Delicious"   Shirelles: "Will You Love Me Tomorrow,” “Tonight's the Night,” ”Dedicated to the One I Love,” “I Met Him on a Sunday”

 

The Concerts start at 7:30

*Bring Chairs, Blankets, Drinks and munchies to share*

There will also be food available on site.

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Doo Wop Show (Duprees, Belmonts, Shirley Alston Reeves of Shirelles)
